articles.title: After Babel
articles.author: Jane Doe
articles.excerpt: A fascinating newsletter about language, culture, and the tiny textures of everyday life.

articles.title: Time Travel Kitchen
articles.author: Alex Smith
articles.excerpt: Recipes, memories, and essays that fold together. Perfect for weekend reading.

articles.title: Two Percent
articles.author: Michael Easter
articles.excerpt: Tech picks, product essays, and curated links. A clean mix of deep thinking and short reads.

articles.title: Well Well Well
articles.author: Rosamund Dean
articles.excerpt: Business reporting and long reads that break down complicated trends into readable essays.

books.title: The Way of Nagomi
books.description: Explains a unique Japanese concept that can help us find and practice a relaxed, effortless form of balance in various areas of life.

books.title: The Algebra of Wealth
books.description: A college professor and serial entrepreneur’s personal formula for achieving financial freedom based on focus, Stoicism, time, and diversification.

books.title: A Tale of Two Cities
books.description: Follows two connected families in 18th-century London and Paris, exploring love, loss, murder, and intrigue.

books.title: Alchemy
books.description: A guide to making magic happen in business and life by teaching you how to practice irrational thinking to stand out.

books.title: In Cold Blood
books.description: A groundbreaking 'nonfiction novel' that narrates how Dick Hickock and Perry Smith conspired, murdered the Clutter family in Kansas in 1959.

books.title: No Hard Feelings
books.description: A practical guide to managing the emotional side of work and building resilience.
